front.title: Network Measurement and Monitoring : A Sprint Perspective

abstract.t: This document provides an overview of network measurements andmonitoring from the perspective of Sprint Advanced Technology Labs.It starts with a detailed discussion of the benefits of monitoringfor an ISP's backbone and the type of measurements required forvarious tasks. It describes the tools and techniques currently inuse, and then outlines what else is needed to meet the challenges ofmonitoring an operational network.
